**Tender Announcement: Take Action on Radon Network and Radon Action Month Campaign**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01019089
**Amendment Number:** 2

**Solicitation Number:** 1000247282
**Publication Date:** December 28, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** February 2, 2023 (14:00:00 Local Time)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Procurement Category:** Service (SRV)

**Contracting Entity:** Health Canada
**Project Description:**

The Radiation Protection Bureau at Health Canada leads the National Radon Program to reduce health risks associated with indoor radon exposure in Canada. This program involves raising awareness and motivating Canadians to take action to reduce their risk from radon exposure. As part of the program, the National Radon Program aims to recruit and engage stakeholders to participate in radon outreach, policy advocacy, and education throughout the fall and winter, with a focus on Radon Action Month in November.

**Purpose and Objective:**

The purpose and objective of this contract is to continue the work started in 2013 with the establishment of Radon Action Month and the development of the Take Action on Radon stakeholder network. The network and campaigns aim to raise awareness, educate, and motivate Canadians to take action to reduce their risk from radon exposure.
